page.title: 03HOUSING IN BUSBY
page.content: Busby is a{suburb}of Glasgow and a popular residential area.Most of the houses on both sides of the Cart are {privately built}(owner occupied). There are some large villas alongside the two main roads.Many of these houses have large gardens surrounded by trees,hedges and walls.It is because of these old sandstsone houses that part of Busby is a{Conservation {Area.} The majority of private houses are semi-detached or detached bungalows built before the war.There are newer private houses and flats next to the industrial estate. About a third of the houses are {council built,}mainly terraced houses and flats.Some cottages have been built for the elderly as well as new {sheltered housing.}Many people have bought their houses from the council.
